about_the_game:
Moonbound Survivors Chest

The Survivors have harnessed the power of the moon... or is it the moon that has them in its grip? Enjoy an Altered state of being with the Moonbound Survivors Chest.

Includes
  • Wilson's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Wendy's Moonbound Skin Set
  • WX-78's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Wickerbottom's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Maxwell's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Webber's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Wormwood's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Walter's Moonbound Skin Set
  • Wanda's Moonbound Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: This Moonbound Chest contains skins for: Walter, Wanda, Maxwell, Webber, Wendy, Wickerbottom, Wilson, Wormwood, and WX-78.
